column1: Thanks to President @realDonaldTrump's Operation Warp Speed we will soon have a safe and effective COVID-19 vaccine. I'm focused on getting this to North Carolinians as soon as possible so we can continue to rebuild our economy & restore our way of life.  https://t.co/ylhGqtBdbc

The House has passed my Combating Pandemic Scams Act which I helped introduce to protect seniors and our most vulnerable citizens from scams during the #COVID19 pandemic.  Proud to work with my @HouseCommerce colleagues on common sense solutions to keep Americans safe. #ncpol https://t.co/eXNf18lRnW

I’m honored to lead this effort to pass targeted solutions to combat COVID-19 and prepare for future pandemics along with @GOPLeader @repgregwalden @RepKevinBrady and @RepKayGranger.   With this legislation we can fulfill our commitment to America and defeat #COVID19. https://t.co/lafTZUPi8M

Starting off this morning at @KCS_NC’s Wonder Career Center with @ChipBuckwell to talk about improvements to their Career and Technical Education programs - more important now than ever to support students and workers as we rebuild our economy following the #COVID19 pandemic. https://t.co/TnP8Z9tOso
@ChipBuckwell Thank you @ChipBuckwell! I appreciate you and all educators on the frontlines of this COVID-19 pandemic for what you do for our students!

I appreciate @SecretaryCarson visiting our community today for a roundtable discussion with local leaders about affordable housing priorities #OpportunityZones and vital #COVID19 relief efforts that are currently underway. #ncpol   Read more: https://t.co/oLVf2XW6tP https://t.co/xYyDklBMm3

Thank you @SecondLady for recognizing #nc08’s own R. Riveter tonight- an amazing business run by military spouses who shifted operations to make #COVID19 face masks for those in need. Military families & small businesses like R. Riveter are the best of America! #RNCConvention2020

#IRS Reminder: IRA owners beneficiaries or workplace retirement plan participants who received a Required Minimum Distribution (RMD) this year have until Aug. 31 to rollover or repay the distribution to avoid paying taxes. #COVIDreliefIRS  https://t.co/RXAtm4Ghlo

North Carolinians and Americans are hurting as a result of #COVID19 and it's up to Congress to ensure they have the resources needed to weather this storm. I look forward to advancing this legislation and getting aid to individuals and families. #ncpol  https://t.co/7Mt65Bd48Q

It was great to join @VP @Mike_Pence  yesterday in NC to discuss how to safely reopen schools and the great progress being made on developing a #COVID19 vaccine thanks to @realDonaldTrump's leadership and #OperationWarpSpeed. https://t.co/K9MsKDsCnQ

Following our first event on school safety with Sec. @BetsyDeVosED @VP @Mike_Pence is now leading a discussion with @SteveFDA on the great progress being made to develop a #COVID__19 vaccine in NC thanks to President @realDonaldTrump's leadership and Operation Warp Speed. #ncpol https://t.co/W1jTgnXcwX

Great to help welcome @VP @Mike_Pence back to North Carolina today! Look forward to discussing how to safely reopen schools and the great progress being made on developing a #COVID vaccine thanks to President @realDonaldTrump's leadership and Operation Warp Speed. #ncpol https://t.co/afI4DryWIC

Enjoyed a ‘high-level’ briefing yesterday at 35000 feet on Air Force One!  Thank you Pres. @realDonaldTrump for coming back to NC and for your leadership to fight #COVID19. Thanks to your Operation Warp Speed the American people will have treatments & a vaccine in record time. https://t.co/APRuKWEmfs

President @realdonaldtrump has led the fight against #COVID. I look forward to joining the president today to highlight progress being made in our state for a vaccine thanks to his leadership and Operation Warp Speed. #ncpol   https://t.co/TpGryK5t6n

Protecting our community from the dangers of PFAS chemicals like GenX is a top priority. My amendments in today's budget bill build on our action to address GenX as well as understand how exposure to PFAS may be linked to greater susceptibility of #COVID. https://t.co/vIL3IzSfDl

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for your leadership to fight #COVID19.  Early travel bans & PPE from Project Air Bridge kept many Americans safe. Now Operation Warp Speed is expediting vaccines from companies like Pfizer in #NC08.  Together we'll beat this virus & rebuild our economy!

I’m committed to getting our community and country needed resources. I’ve co-sponsored the Strengthening America’s National Stockpile Act to deliver critical investments in our ability to respond to and prepare for public health crises like #COVID19.   https://t.co/CKe2D9WfoC

The @NCNationalGuard has stepped up to serve our state's communities in need during the #COVID19 pandemic. Living up to their motto as a Ready Reliable Responsive and Relevant Force.   Thank you for your selfless service. #ncpol #InItTogether   https://t.co/AwTD056Ni1

Faith leaders play critical roles in our communities especially as we face new challenges from #COVID19. Today I had the pleasure to speak with pastors from across our region about how we can work together to heal our country and care for those in need. #InItTogether

“Truck drivers are the backbone of our economy and are facing increased pressures due to #COVID19 and social unrest" Hudson said in a statement to @FoxBusiness. "I am committed to supporting their safety and vital role in our economy.” #2A #ConcealedCarry https://t.co/IIYP1vL1KK

Good to be back w my @HouseCommerce colleagues to discuss #covid19’s impact on our nation’s Energy Sector. However I’m disappointed my colleagues across the aisle were not present to have these discussions in person. Congress must get back to work! #EssentialWorkers https://t.co/A1vPdPKWhg

Rowan County: Here are #COVID19 testing sites in our community for the week of June 8 through June 12.  Any testing questions or #COVID19 questions/concerns please contact the HOTLINE at 980-432-1800 or email covid-19@rowancountync.gov. #ncpol  https://t.co/2wcZsLphZj

It was great to welcome @SecretaryRoss to Charlotte today to discuss the #PaycheckProtectionProgram & efforts to get liquidity to our state’s vital hospitality industry. I thx @POTUS & his administration for remaining committed to helping NC reopen & recover from #COVID19. #ncpol https://t.co/uL4ieKbbaE

The @IRSnews has provided #COVID19 tips to help taxpayers understand the relief available under the #CARESAct and other recent legislation. You can find these tips on my website here: https://t.co/LQbOXhl4AR

“Our industry appreciates Rep. Hudson‘s leadership in writing along with nearly 100 of his House colleagues to demand assurances that taxpayer #COVID19  relief funds will be disbursed in a fair and non-discriminatory manner.” - @NSSF   Read our letter: https://t.co/53KCdBOg9m

I'm leading 98 of my colleagues to urge @stevenmnuchin1 @federalreserve & @SBAJovita to prevent #covid_19 banking discrimination against lawful industries like firearms & ammunition for political reasons. Thanks to these members for standing w me to further protect the #2A https://t.co/opTLwQGxu9

America is coming together to fight #Covid_19 from partnerships like @atriumhealth and @zMAXdragway to relief efforts made possible by President @realDonaldTrump & @secazar. Continuing to work together is the only way to combat this pandemic & get our country #Reopen. #ncpol https://t.co/YPFv2RNWV9

Meeting with @SecAzar & @AtriumHealth CEO Gene Woods at their #coronavirus Testing Center outside @zMAXDragway. Since March this center has served over 2500 residents of the Charlotte region in an effort to safely provide accessible testing to the public.   #InItTogether #ncpol https://t.co/G4a3uI8XtB

I look forward to joining @HHSGov @SecAzar at @CLTMotorSpdwy today to discuss #Covid_19 testing with @AtriumHealth and other ways we are working together to get our community needed resources. #ncpol https://t.co/Ufsdz8v8Ry

This week @AtriumHealth will continue to provide mobile #Covid_19 testing centers in several locations including Concord on Friday. No appointment is necessary & the screening and testing will be conducted on a walk-in basis. #ncpol    https://t.co/XJBGhXgUuq

#COVID19 has shown the dangers of being reliant on countries like China for industries including manufacturing & health care. That’s why I’m introducing legislation to advance American manufacturing & protect our supply chains for critical industries.  https://t.co/RZDB69Ylvb

Today I'll be voting no on House Democrats' new $3 trillion partisan bill unveiled by Nancy Pelosi w no input from @HouseGOP the @SenateGOP or the @WhiteHouse. We should be working together to solve challenges related to #COVID19 not wasting time on a partisan #wishlist. https://t.co/Pe5AGFotwO

Now is the time to get people back to work. We can’t borrow & spend money to get out of this. We have to get businesses running and folks are anxious to get on with their lives. Watch my full response on how we can reopen N.C. in a safe way from last night’s #COVIDー19 town hall: https://t.co/oLQbbRI5dw
About to join tonight’s #NCCOVID19 town hall on @FOX46News and @WNCN. #ncpol https://t.co/TB39W5aOyQ

During these difficult times and always you're not alone in the fight against #Alzheimers. Stay updated by visiting the #COVID19 Help Center featuring access to 24/7 support resources and tips for people living with dementia #caregivers and families. https://t.co/quWpax4CRv

Unfortunately bad actors have tried to use the #CoronavirusOutbreak to prey on innocent people. That's why I joined @RepBuddyCarter & @RepLBR to introduced legislation to ensure the public is aware of scams to better protect themselves & their loved ones. https://t.co/8EprQvaZQA https://t.co/wnyYH346Sl

Today I spoke w @NikkiHaley to discuss #COVID19 and #China. I value her perspective as an Amb & Gov & look forward to working w my @HouseCommerce colleagues on legislation to protect cyber security & America's manufacturing sector. Thx you @cathymcmorris for setting up the call.
Thank you to all the nurses across the country who are courageously serving on the frontlines in our fight against #COVID19. #NationalNursesDay #NursesDay https://t.co/IFlAXRZaK1

🚨Veterans and seniors with dependents: If you do not normally file a tax return today is the LAST DAY to register to receive your full #COVIDー19 economic impact payment. Learn more from @IRSnews ⬇️  https://t.co/Wbbe8cG9Vz https://t.co/djMR0nlzaX

The #CARESAct authorized @HHS to directly cover costs of hospitals health systems and other providers related to #COVID19. Since April 19th over $37 million has been paid out to providers on the front lines of the response in North Carolina’s 8th District. #InItTogether

The restaurant industry has suffered significant sales & job losses since the #COVID19 outbreak began. Thank you @SteveScalise for hosting a call today with Chef @Emeril to discuss the unprecedented challenges facing the industry & need to provide relief to workers. #InItTogether https://t.co/ypOPXt9Q14

President @realDonaldTrump has worked tirelessly to get lifesaving resources to Americans on the frontlines of #COVID19. So far North Carolina has received:    ✅516312 N95 Masks ✅2305150 Surgical Masks ✅1027000 Medical Gowns ✅146027 Face Shields ✅48020353 Gloves https://t.co/uGlxWOTRn0

Check out this video from @GOPLeader highlighting the #PaycheckPrtoectionProgram and other relief President @realDonaldTrump has made available for small business owners employees and the recently unemployed during the #COVID19 pandemic. #InItTogether   https://t.co/PT8eKbiKHP

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram has already been a lifeline for workers impacted by #COVID19. The funding we passed yesterday will save an additional 28.7 million jobs across the country including 765000 in North Carolina. https://t.co/UbqUQA6K9V

North Carolina independent contractors and self-employed workers out of work because of #COVID19 can apply for federal Pandemic Unemployment Assistance beginning this Friday April 24. Find out more information on my website https://t.co/X1dleWAP1M

This morning I participated in @oscepa’s webinar discussing the long-term socio-economic effects of #COVID19. I appreciate hearing directly from my colleagues abroad and look forward to continuing our work together during this global pandemic. #InItTogether https://t.co/jnzZChXTxH https://t.co/BjCBJKqUxc

Proud to join @RepTedBudd in recognizing our state's essential workers. Without their service North Carolina's response to the #coronavirus pandemic would not be possible.   #InItTogether https://t.co/vYEvnH8PGB

Oil markets continued to drop today due to historically low demand amidst #COVIDー19. #OPEC must terminate their attempt to undercut the US market through oversupply during this crisis. I'll continue to work with President @realDonaldTrump to encourage stability. #CrudeOil

Breaking: @AtriumHealth is launching their Mobile Health Unit to screen and test for #COVID19 in our communities. See times dates and locations below⬇️  11:00am to 6:00pm Friday April 24:  Northside Baptist Church located at 333 Jeremiah Blvd. Charlotte NC  28262.

Earlier today I talked to Administrator @EPAAWheeler about ways to provide relief to Americans during the #Covid_19 crisis including advocating for solutions that could help disinfect hospitals. #InItTogether https://t.co/aeBN5BxyMw

At 10:30am I’ll be hosting another Telephone Town Hall with Rep @PatrickMcHenry Patrick McHenry to give an update on #Coronavirus relief for small business as well as take your questions.   Dial: 877-229-8493 (pin: 115254#)   Join online: https://t.co/KPmRNEWoZP
This is good news for millions of Americans who are feeling the economic impacts of #COVID19. https://t.co/qs1UxBZ3La

Across the country Americans are #InItTogether in response to the #COVID19 outbreak. Use the map to see the many amazing ways North Carolinians are stepping up and helping out: https://t.co/qKQZ7qxCWO https://t.co/AEesovGGd0

Unfortunately bad actors have tried to use the #coronavirus crisis to prey on people through scams and price gouging. The Combating Pandemic Scams Act will ensure the public is aware of scams to better protect themselves and their loved ones. #InItTogether https://t.co/trOAdiYFvA
This is good news for our state. Our @NCNationalGuard has outstanding capabilities to support NC’s #COVID19 response. #InItTogether https://t.co/HFrAgmAnSF

TOMORROW: Tune-in to @wbtradio (1110 AM / 99.3 FM) at 8:50am where I’ll be talking with @PatMcCroryNC about our #CoronavirusPandemic response and Day 1 of the Paycheck Protection Program. #ncpol   Listen here: https://t.co/pyCxjq2loN
Check out my interview on "Up Front" with Cabarrus Magazine about our response to #coronavirus. Thanks for having me on Jason!  #ncpol   Listen here: https://t.co/ls73FKxuy6

Thank you to all the #NC08 mayor's and town officials who joined our conference call this afternoon. I will continue to be a voice for our district in Washington as our communities respond to #COVID19.   (nice #SocialDistanacing demo by my staffer 📸📏) https://t.co/95qkHfyTIc

The #CARESAct establishes a new Paycheck Protection Program which will provide much-needed relief to millions of small businesses so they can sustain their businesses and keep their workers employed during the #COVID19 pandemic.   Learn more: https://t.co/Ys94xYKZUi #ncpol https://t.co/iOVccCVeeI

At 5pm @NC_Governor's Order to Stay Home comes into effect. Please visit https://t.co/LQbOXhl4AR which is continuously updated with the latest #COVID19 info and answers to FAQ about resources available to small businesses veterans students and all residents of #NC08. #ncpol

Please visit https://t.co/LQbOXhl4AR which is continuously updated with the latest #coronavirus information and answers to frequently asked questions about resources available to small businesses veterans students and all residents of #NC08. #ncpol

#COVID19NC resources for businesses and employers #ncpol:  Can your business be deemed essential? Find out: https://t.co/1Gja9xXJjj  For local #COVID19 loan assistance and @SBAgov updates: https://t.co/59cxO5PiSj  More from @ncdhhs here: https://t.co/x3yoi6bWMm

The tragic news that a member of our community is the first #COVID19 associated death in North Carolina underscores the seriousness of this pandemic especially for those with underlying health conditions. Renee and I send our prayers to their family.  https://t.co/mTGM2f9Vtl

While protecting public health is our top priority no government or law enforcement agency should use the #coronavirus to infringe upon our 2nd Amendment rights. I call on Sheriff Baker to follow NC law and continue to process pistol permits. #ncpol  https://t.co/f41C4Kuasx

My team has been working to get Cynthia home to Midland since we first heard she was stuck in Honduras during a mission trip. While the #coronavirus outbreak continues to disrupt travel and everyday life I’ll continue to do everything I can to help all those in need. #ncpol https://t.co/Xq2qL7GbzW

Proud to see my home county stepping up in response to the #CoronavirusOutbreak. Thank you @AtriumHealth and @zMAXDragway x @CLTMotorSpdwy for your united response and partnership! #ncpol https://t.co/f59YNkKnSD

We all have a role to play to #FlattenTheCuve   ➡️Info: https://t.co/aQRxKkKz1j ☎️For #COVID19 questions dial 2-1-1 or 888-892-1162 📱Sign up for updates by texting COVIDNC to 898211 https://t.co/XaevtZWRTj

As we remember the millions of women who went to work during WWII we must also honor the modern day Rosies like our military spouses and the many women in healthcare professions who are working around the clock to combat the #CoronavirusOutbreak. #WeCanDoIt #RosietheRiveterDay https://t.co/BEnlWaTmt8

I led a bipartisan letter today with @SenThomTillis signed by more than 100 members of the House and Senate urging the Trump administration to ensure America’s agriculture industry has the workforce it needs as our nation combats #Covid_19.  Read more: https://t.co/J1zbAc6utE

Yesterday I sent a letter requesting funding for @DeptofDefense and @DeptVetAffairs to address the #CoronavirusOutbreak. I'm glad @POTUS has now included this in his proposal.  I will continue to ensure our veterans service members & their families have the resources they need. https://t.co/JHwDkg5TOW

I joined @SenThomTillis and @RepDavidEPrice to urge the @SBAgov to make a disaster declaration to aid North Carolina. Small businesses in our state are the backbone of our economy and hurting right now due to #coronavirus. We need immediate action. #ncpol  https://t.co/vlmGG7LlOm

Today I held a conference call with school superintendents to update them on what the federal government is doing to respond to #coronavirus and hear their concerns. My goal is to get them information they need to reduce stress on teachers staff and students. https://t.co/3j3QUoxW2a

The NC Department of Public Instruction’s School Nutrition division will continue to serve meals to students while schools are closed due to #coronavirus.   Here is a county-by-county breakdown for #NC08:  https://t.co/23HF83MMGe

Today @WhiteHouse issued new guidance to slow the spread of #Coronavirus in the United States including an instruction to Americans to avoid social gatherings in groups of more than 10 people.  Please see the full guidelines below or use this link: https://t.co/b5lhmYpOFH https://t.co/ipxVbhypjx

The @DeptVetAffairs has set up a #coronavirus website with guidelines on what to do regarding #COVID-19. As always I am available to help any veteran who has issues with the VA or has questions regarding coronavirus. #ncpol  https://t.co/2QNco7RzbP
Please make sure the information you are receiving regarding #Coronavirus is from reliable sources such as @CDCgov @ncdhhs @NCEmergency and @WHO. https://t.co/YmhLi1Shu9

As we monitor all information regarding #coronavirus my staff and I will continue to be available to answer questions and assist all #NC08 citizens.   Read my latest office policy and check for updates here: https://t.co/LQbOXhl4AR.

President @realDonaldTrump has declared tomorrrow a National Day of Prayer. Let’s pray for our president health care providers and all those impacted by the #coronavirus. This is a time for all of us to come together.

Republicans & Democrats need to work together to make sure anyone who needs a #coronavirus test can get one. We also need to protect workers & small businesses from potential impacts. I’ll continue to work with local state & federal partners to keep our communities safe. #ncpol

Pres. @realDonaldTrump has declared a #StateOfEmergency & new partnerships with the private sector. I'm hopeful these actions will help meet the needs of states like NC for more test kits as I work on legislation to address the #coronavirus that is timely targeted & temporary.

Out of an abundance of caution due to #coronavirus the Capitol Visitor Center has temporarily suspended all U.S. Capitol tours beginning today at 5:00 p.m. Learn more information about how my office can help:  https://t.co/2Z2QUQ08ht

Today I joined @SenThomTillis and @RepDavidEPrice to send a letter to @VP Pence addressing North Carolina's need for additional #coronavirus test kits. My top priority continues to be the safety and peace of mind of North Carolinians. #nc08 #ncpol   https://t.co/bBRgVspQ1T

In light of the funding bill we passed yesterday this morning I spoke with hospitals in NC to ensure they have the necessary resources to address #coronavirus. I will continue to work with our local and state partners to make sure our communities are properly funded & prepared. https://t.co/xEurSwjQE7

I voted for emergency funding today to address the #Coronavius. While there is much more to do today’s funding will further strengthen our ability to respond and treat the virus.  Full statement:  https://t.co/xcggWRzPW7
NOW: Being briefed on latest #CoronavirusOutbreak  developments by @VP Mike Pence Dr. Anthony Fauci and others. https://t.co/zdM5V4Rwfg

As a member of the Energy & Commerce Subcommittee on Health I'm closely monitoring the outbreak of #Coronavirus and the first presumptive case in North Carolina.  Learn more about safety precautions travel information and other resources here: https://t.co/LQbOXh3tch.

I look forward to President Trump’s address tonight and will work to make sure the administration and health care professionals have the resources we need to prepare and respond to the #CoronavirusOutbreak.

While there are currently no cases of coronavirus in North Carolina as a member of the @HouseCommerce Health Subcommittee I’ll continue to monitor the situation and have remained in close contact with our local health care providers.

HHS @SecAzar addressed our @HouseCommerce Health Subcommittee today on what the administration is doing to combat the coronavirus since it first declared a public health emergency in the US on January 31. We must all work together to address this head on.
